mapper.select: SELECT FILE_SEQ ,FILE_GRP_SEQ ,FILE_TYPE ,FILE_EXT ,FILE_ORG_NM ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_SAVE_NM ,CONCAT(FILE_ORG_NM,'.',FILE_EXT) AS FILE_FULL_NM ,REG_TIMESTAMP ,UPD_TIMESTAMP ,USE_YN FROM TB_LC_FILE01 WHERE FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq}

SELECT COM_CODE AS CODE_DTL_CD ,COM_NAME AS CODE_DTL_NM FROM TB_LC_COMPANY WHERE COM_CODE != 3000001
AND COM_CODE IN (SELECT TLW.COM_CODE FROM TB_LC_WORK TLW WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #{regSeq})
ORDER BY COM_NAME ASC

SELECT member_seq , member_id , password , com_code , FN_COM_CODE(COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM , member_name , email , extension_no , mobile_no , dept_nm , position_nm , join_dt , role_name , terms_yn , terms_date , option_terms_yn , option_terms_date , appr_stat , msg , file_seq , fail_cnt , cre_yn , cre_grp , drop_yn FROM tb_lc_members WHERE member_seq = #{regSeq}

SELECT pay_seq , order_no , master_seq , pay_type , seq_no , approval_no , id , name , sell_mm , amt ,TO_CHAR(REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP FROM tb_lc_pay WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq} ORDER BY PAY_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
